meanings.definition: The position or rank of a captain.
meanings.sent1: In the navy, many aspire to achieve captainships.
meanings.sent2: The captainships in the fleet were highly respected.
meanings.sent3: The captainships on the high seas were always full of adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership style was like a well-earned captainships.
meanings.sent5: The captainships of the ship guided them safely through the storm.

meanings.definition: The authority or leadership of a captain.
meanings.sent1: The captainships of the team inspired everyone to work harder.
meanings.sent2: His captainships ensured the crew followed orders diligently.
meanings.sent3: The captainships of the classroom kept the students engaged and focused.
meanings.sent4: She wielded her captainships with grace and confidence.
meanings.sent5: The captainships of the company led to great success and growth.
